justification: Team A is injury-averse and needs immediate wins, yet targets an Out Tier 5 RB—contradictory. Team B doesn’t have a TE void (owns Tier 1 Alex Thomas) and, as a conservative, volume-oriented manager, is unlikely to trade RB depth for TE. Value is lopsided (healthy Tier 2 TE for injured depth RB). Rationale is generic and ignores stated manager preferences.
